title: Mortgage satisfaction and lien release
dataVerified: Borrower name, lender, property address, loan account, release date
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents forged lien releases. Domain binding verifies lender/county recorder. Permanent clear title proof. Critical for property sales. Prevents title fraud.
